column1: CIO-CI-Access Team, Ministry of Defence, CIO-FOI@mod.uk

column3: Request Summary
Please advise, and provide information and details, on various questions regarding various aspects of British military law.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the eligibility for compensations for veterans that have developed skin cancer after being deployed to sun exposed parts of the world.
Please provide information the MOD hold regarding the 1957 Viking Blackbushe accident.
Please provide a copy of the Board of Inquiry or Unit Inquiry Report into the accident involving Nimrod XV231 on 10 September 1987.
Please advise on the funding for the Army's College at Sandhurst.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding RN 20mm GAMBO cannon ammunition.
Please advise on the total sum of money allocated to the MOD in 2011.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the universities attended and degrees obtained for RAF, Army and Navy legal officers recruited between 2000-2010.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding recruitment in the Royal Air Force.
Please advise on the number of people made compulsory and voluntarily redundant in FY 2010.
Please provide copies of all editions of the publication JDP 1-10: Captured Persons.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the annual peacetime operating costs of various Army military units.
Please provide information and details on the contract MoD awarded to Babcock Infrastructure.
Please advise, and provide information and details, to various questions regarding Royal Navy redundancies.
Please advise and provide information on the importance of Chile's support for the outcome of the Falklands Campaign.
Please provide a copy of Alignment Between the Security Forces and Civil Government.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of those serving with the Irish guards came from the Republic of Ireland.
Please advise since when, and for how long, bromide was administered routinely to British soldiers.
Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number and type of staff in the MOD from 1945 - end of WWII, 1956 - Suez engagement, 1982 -  Falklands engagement and 2010 - present.
Please advise whether MOD hold any information or statistical data on offence rates for children/youth from a military background.
Please provide copies of any guidance issued on personal emails in relation to the Freedom of Information Act and the Data Protection Act.
Please advise and provide information and details to various questions regarding Trade Union collective agreements for DSG.
Please advise on the number of qualified commercial officers, out of eleven, were over 50 years old and had more that twenty years service, were offered voluntary early release.
Please provide a breakdown, by vocation, of requests received by MOD.
Please provide information on the exact longitude and latitude of the Atlantic Conveyor when she was struck by an exocet missile on 25 May 1982 during the Falklands conflict.
Please provide copies of HQ Northern Ireland Operational statistical summaries from January 1990 - December 1993.
Please provide information and details on the internet-facing IP address or address range of the proxy and/or gateway computers that the MOD's web browsing uses.
Please provide copies of documentation for the American Eagle Squadron numbers 71, 121, and 133.

Please provide a copy of the scorecard and details of the unsuccessful tenderers for contract 2011/S 184-300762.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on submariner strengths from 2005 - 2011 and projections to 2015.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of staff suspended from MOD in each of the last three financial years (2010/11, 2009/10 and 2008/9).

Please advise, and provide information and details, regarding the recent Tranche 1 redundancy board results for the Army.
Please provide a copy of the inquiry proceedings and verdict into the loss of a Lincoln bomber aircraft on 22 March 1954.
Please provide the latest information on autism figures in defence establishments (including ships).
Please provide information and details on various nuclear exercises.
Please provide a copy of the scorecard and details of the unsuccessful tenderers for contract 2011/S 184-300761.
Please provide information on the rehabilitation of soldiers.
Please advise on the number of Royal Navy personnel and Royal Marines who have qualified for the Operational Service Medal for Afghanistan (Op Herrick).

Please provide copies of all correspondence between the Admiralty and Leo Szilard, the Admiralty and Claremont Haynes, the Admiralty and the Society for the Protection of Science and Learning from 1933 1937. Please provide information of all British operations, staff presence and military intelligence in Naples and Palermo from 15 March 1938 - June 1940.

Please provide copies of any reports, memos, correspondence or other documentation that summarise progress on completing the eight tasks stipulated by the DNSR to date regarding the improvement notice of 26 May 2010, along with any further communications from the DNSR relating to this notice.
Please provide details on the flying circuits at Brize Norton.
Please advise on the survival/promotion rates for RNP.

Please advise, and provide information and details, on the number of identification cases the Joint Casualty and Compassionate Centre are currently aware of in foreign countries along with the anticipated timescale for these to be investigated.
Please provide information and details of the POW camp at Hickleton Park which was attached to Hickleton Hall Headquarters in South Yorkshire during WWII.

Please provide information and details to various questions regarding MDPGA's ICT spend.

If the Safety Improvement Notice has been closed to the satisfaction of DNSR, please provide a copy of correspondence confirming its closure.

Please advise on the number of Royal Marine officers that have been administratively discharged in the last five years along with information on the number of General Staff offices, from all three services, that have had complaints upheld against them.

Please provide information and details of FATS, EA and IT/IS expenditure for MOD.

Please provide information and details of all correspondence relating to Skydive Weston from 1 January 2010 and the setting up of RAFPA.
Please provide information and details on HMS Collingwood.
Please provide the full report of the RAF Board of Inquiry into the Canberra B2 WH667 crash at RAF Akrotiri on 7 November 1980.
If possible I would like to obtain a copy of the photograph taken of xxxxx being awarded Nurse of the Year award in the early 1970s.
Please advise, and provide information and details on the number of people and ranks of senior officers that work at MOD HQ, Whitehall, and its associated buildings.
Please advise, and provide information and details, regarding the abduction or kidnapping of British troops in Afghanistan and Iraq since 2001 and 2003 respectively.

Please provide details of all MOD meetings (including the date, location, subject and list of who was present) at which Adam Werritty was present. Please also provide all email correspondence concerning Adam Werritty from May 2010.

Please provide a copy of JSP 567.
